triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Fundamental theoretical tool used to prove stability of equilibrium in control systems.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Recursive control technique applied to design controllers for nonlinear systems.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Neural-approximation-based adaptive control method developed for uncertain multiagent systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Problem domain of controlling multiple interacting intelligent agents with containment constraints.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks employed for function approximation in the adaptive control design.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Control theory domain addressing nonlinear multiagent systems with state constraints.
